name: Dragon Fire Demo
description:
This is a playable demo of a game I'm currently working on. I'm not satisfied with how the elements fit together so I'm asking YOU to send me your feedback and ideas to contact.trgames@gmail.com !

The game's graphics and performance is in early development. There's no tutorial, so please read the "HowToPlay.pdf" file that's included in the archive.

Thanks a lot.... I Hope with your help this will become something great! :D
